cs.ualberta.ca.tunein

Interface ThreadControllerInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ThreadController

    public interface ThreadControllerInterface
    Controller ThreadControllerInterface Class: This is the interface for the ThreadController and is implemented by controllers to modify comments in a list.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createTopic(Comment aComment)
      This method creates a new topic comment in the list.
      void sortByDate()
      This method sorts the list of comments by the date of comments.
      void sortByLocation(GeoLocation loc)
      This method sorts the list of comments by the user's location.
      void sortByPicture()
      This method sorts the list of comments by the criteria of having pictures and date.
      void sortBySetLocation(GeoLocation loc)
      This method sorts the list of comments by a set location.

    • Method Detail

      • createTopic

        void createTopic(Comment aComment)
        This method creates a new topic comment in the list.
        Parameters:
        aComment - The comment to be added.

      • sortByDate

        void sortByDate()
        This method sorts the list of comments by the date of comments.

      • sortByLocation

        void sortByLocation(GeoLocation loc)
        This method sorts the list of comments by the user's location.
        Parameters:
        loc - The location that the comments will be sorted.

      • sortByPicture

        void sortByPicture()
        This method sorts the list of comments by the criteria of having pictures and date.

      • sortBySetLocation

        void sortBySetLocation(GeoLocation loc)
        This method sorts the list of comments by a set location.
        Parameters:
        loc - The location that the comments will be sorted.
